titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States limiting the number of terms for Members of the House of Representatives and the Senate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Limits Members of the House of Representatives to six terms and Members of the Senate to two terms.
